steps.name: Add prdouct to cart from product details page with quantity: [0]
Get added to cart alert message
Get the quantity of the product after opening the shopping cart
Get total price of the product that exist in shopping cart
Calculate the total price by multiplying Product quantity and Product price
Get the total price of the order in shopping cart
Open shopping cart from the link on notification
